feed.title: A reason we can all agree on to increase block size

entry.title: A reason we can all agree on to increase block size
entry.summary: On August 3, 2015, Simon Liu raised the question regarding block size increase in Bitcoin-dev. The post stated that the five largest Chinese miners were fine with an increase to 8 MB, indicating that it should not be a problem for them. In response to this, someone asked about the current stance of Chinese pools on Bitcoin XT and if they would run it if the economic majority publicly supported big blocks.
